title: Ban appeal
body:
Hello Riot, I would like to appeal a ban for one 14 day-suspension, (ID: Find Me In UNSW) because the game playing leblanc is not myself, my account has been staled. And this guy feed in that game cause my account has been suspended. I am a sufferer too. In addition, the guy who steals my account also change my ID, my past id is Realistic Master. Therefore, i hope official can recover my ban. Because that is not my game match. At now, i have change my password and username, but i hope riot game can recover my account, and keep playing in league of legends. 

Yours sincerely - Realistic Master

replies.body:
Submit an account recovery ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

This process will require you to be signed out of the support site. I would also recommend that you use an email address *not* connected to your League of Legends account as you likely don't know how access was gained to your account, and it may have been through email.

Your account will likely be permanently suspended during this process. This a security ban to prevent any further action on the account while ownership is verified, and will be removed once the account is secure with the original owner.

Any suspensions applied while the account was under compromise will be revoked, and usually any content purchased/currency used/etc. will be reversed (there are some things they can't reverse like LP gains and such).
